body: This was translated on another site I forget if it complete I think they were doing it by chapther I've read at least half forgot the site but just Google it should come up.

The ending is basically that the main girl gets chosen by a demon to give birth to the next demon lord. The other girls she was with at the earlier chapters are being used to have other demons. Main girl's kid (the hero) is training and says something like he will avenge his mother and kill the demon king, meanwhile main girl is pregnant again and talks to her baby (the demon king) to get stronger and be born soon. So she was used to give birth to the hero and the demon king.
Ah, this series... some crazy fucking plot, but still, good read.
